author: tkettle9719
title: A dog that I can finally love...
review:
I love Target, as well as their mascot, Bullseye the dog.You just buy the gift card and... Free Lego! 

Pros

  • The target piece for Bullseye's eye just rocks.
  • The model is simple, but very cute.
  • The little ears are just so adorable.

Cons

  • Last year's Bullseye just looks a bit worse than last year's model.
  • Seeing as I only wanted Bullseye, I really didn't enjoy the extra pieces for the other two models.
  • This is really quite minor, but I really would have liked the legs to be done with separate pieces so that it would have the realism factor.

This set is really cool, and limited. It's almost like free Lego, in a way. If you can still get it, then go to Target right now and BUY IT!

author: Phenix
title: Free 3 in 1!
review:
Second year for the Target exclusive gift card promotion.  This year, it's a three in one set with even more pieces than last years.   On to the review!

Pros:

- Three themed models 
- exclusive Target bullseye brick
- different dog build than last year
- more bricks
- low minimum card price ($5)
- larger print run/more available in stores
- detachable gift card with Lego theme

Cons: 

- polar bears arms a bit unsecure
- claw arms of snowman lame


Overall, well worth the price of FREE.  As a building tip, my daughter made a cool dancing bear by giving him the snowman top hat and broom.  Adding the "tooth" parts for claws also enhances the arms of the bear.


On a side note, if you are one of those hoarders that are buying dozens of these to sell on E-bay, for shame, for shame.   Leave some for the moms and dada and grandmas, so some happy kid can find one of these gems in their stockings christmas morning instead.
